item.title: Trump says Kurds are 'very happy' with U.S.-brokered deal and U.S. has 'taken control' of oil
item.description: Fighting is continuing near the Syria-Turkey border despite a Trump administration boast it had helped broker a 'cease-fire,' Kurdish authorities say.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Shesgreen, Kim Hjelmgaard, Tom Vanden Brook and David Jackson, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Fighting is continuing near the Syria-Turkey border despite a Trump administration boast it had helped broker a 'cease-fire,' Kurdish authorities say.

item.title: Gunbattle erupts in Mexican city in attempt to capture El Chapo's son
item.description: Mexican security police attempting to arrest a son of convicted drug kingpin El Chapo came under heavy fire from armed fighters Thursday, turning the city of Culiacan in northwest Mexico into a freefire zone.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Doug Stanglin, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Mexican security police attempting to arrest a son of convicted drug kingpin El Chapo came under heavy fire from armed fighters Thursday, turning the city of Culiacan in northwest Mexico into a freefire zone.

item.title: Long-extinct Tasmanian tigers spotted at least eight times, officials say
item.description: Between 2016 to 2019, the report notes seven sightings of the Tasmanian tiger. It "had black stripes on the back side of the body."
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: N'dea Yancey-Bragg and Joshua Bote, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Between 2016 to 2019, the report notes seven sightings of the Tasmanian tiger. It "had black stripes on the back side of the body."

item.title: Acrimony, divisions, frustration: UK's 3-year Brexit battle nears end but it's not over
item.description: After three years of acrimony and frustration related to Britain's EU divorce battle, Brexit's end may be near but the ordeal is not over.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: After three years of acrimony and frustration related to Britain's EU divorce battle, Brexit's end may be near but the ordeal is not over.

item.title: The Amazon hasn't stopped burning. There were 19,925 fire outbreaks last month, and 'more fires' are in the future
item.description: The number of Amazon fires has decreased since they elicited an international outcry in August, but experts believe this is just a temporary respite.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Jorge L. Ortiz, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: The number of Amazon fires has decreased since they elicited an international outcry in August, but experts believe this is just a temporary respite.

item.title: Mike Pence announces that Turkey agreed to a five-day cease-fire in its Syria assault
item.description: Vice President Mike Pence and Secretary of State Mike Pompeo land in Turkey to salvage U.S. interests in Syria.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Shesgreen and Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Vice President Mike Pence and Secretary of State Mike Pompeo land in Turkey to salvage U.S. interests in Syria.

item.title: Lindsey Graham to President Trump: `I will hold you accountable' on Turkey's actions in Syria
item.description: Graham has been one of President Trump's most vocal defenders in other controversies. But on Syria, the defense hawk has become Trump's chief antagonist.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Shesgreen and Maureen Groppe, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Graham has been one of President Trump's most vocal defenders in other controversies. But on Syria, the defense hawk has become Trump's chief antagonist.

item.title: Labeled terrorists in their homeland, hundreds of Turks seek asylum in New Jersey
item.description: About 500 Turks arrived in New Jersey amid a purge of people Turkey blames for a coup attempt in 2016.
item.author: North Jersey Record
item.dc:creator: Hannan Adely, North Jersey Record
item.content:encoded: About 500 Turks arrived in New Jersey amid a purge of people Turkey blames for a coup attempt in 2016.

item.title: Britain and EU claim breakthrough Brexit deal ahead of summit
item.description: Prime Minister Boris Johnson and EU negotiators claim a breakthrough Brexit deal that will enable Britain's orderly withdrawal from the bloc.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Prime Minister Boris Johnson and EU negotiators claim a breakthrough Brexit deal that will enable Britain's orderly withdrawal from the bloc.

item.title: In shift, Trump administration says it will restore some U.S. aid to Central America
item.description: Critics had denounced Trump's freeze on US aid to Central America as counterproductive.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Shesgreen, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Critics had denounced Trump's freeze on US aid to Central America as counterproductive.

item.title: Kim Jong Un poses for photos riding a white horse up a mountain. The internet has thoughts
item.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is shown wearing a long, light-brown coat and riding up snow-covered Mount Paektu on horseback.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Adrianna Rodriguez, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is shown wearing a long, light-brown coat and riding up snow-covered Mount Paektu on horseback.

item.title: Impeachment: Ex-Pompeo aide testifies about Ukraine as spotlight shines on Trump's foreign policy
item.description: Michael McKinley, a top aide to Mike Pompeo, resigned from his post last week after a career that spanned decades in the State Department.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Shesgreen, Bart Jansen and Savannah Behrmann, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Michael McKinley, a top aide to Mike Pompeo, resigned from his post last week after a career that spanned decades in the State Department.

item.title: Turkey's leader rebuffs US call for Syria cease-fire, says he'll meet Pence, not just Trump
item.description: Turkey's President Recep Tayyip Erdogan says he will, after all, meet with Mike Pence and Mike Pompeo when they arrive in Turkey on Thursday.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Deirdre Shesgreen and Kim Hjelmgaard, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Turkey's President Recep Tayyip Erdogan says he will, after all, meet with Mike Pence and Mike Pompeo when they arrive in Turkey on Thursday.

item.title: George Kent, Ukraine-Russia expert, said he raised red flags about Giuliani and Ukraine, Democrat says
item.description: George Kent, an expert on Ukraine and Russia who serves as a deputy assistant secretary at the State Department, appeared Tuesday before lawmakers.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: Christal Hayes and Deirdre Shesgreen, USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: George Kent, an expert on Ukraine and Russia who serves as a deputy assistant secretary at the State Department, appeared Tuesday before lawmakers.

item.title: Kim Jong Un stages photo shoot on white horse
item.description: North Korea released a series of photos Oct. 16, 2019 showing leader Kim Jong Un riding a white horse to a sacred mountain.

item.content:encoded: North Korea released a series of photos Oct. 16, 2019 showing leader Kim Jong Un riding a white horse to a sacred mountain.

item.title: Turkey launches military offensive in Syria
item.description: Turkey was on the brink of launching an offensive into Kurdish parts of Syria, days after President Donald Trump announced U.S. troops would withdraw.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Turkey was on the brink of launching an offensive into Kurdish parts of Syria, days after President Donald Trump announced U.S. troops would withdraw.

item.title: Typhoon Hagibis floods over 1,000 homes in Japan as the death toll climbs
item.description: Thousands of troops were deployed across Japan to rescue people stranded in flooded homes as the death toll from a ferocious typhoon climbed.
item.author: USA TODAY
item.dc:creator: USA TODAY
item.content:encoded: Thousands of troops were deployed across Japan to rescue people stranded in flooded homes as the death toll from a ferocious typhoon climbed.
